title: Doom Eternal is id Software's Evil Dead II | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()[Doom Eternal](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/doom-eternal-release-date-gameplay-3483704) will release on [PlayStation4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/playstation-4), [XboxOne](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/xbox-one-s),[PC](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/best-gaming-pc-2993099) and [NintendoSwitch](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nintendo-switch) in 2019. Youcan find out more about it by reading our preview, which has the latestdetails about the game along with all current trailers.
